name: Lucian
title: the Purifier
w_dispalyname: Ardent Blaze / Ardent Blaze 2 / Ardent Blaze 3

i1.blurb: Whenever Lucian uses an ability, his next attack becomes a double-shot.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} After using an ability, '''Lucian's''' next [[basic attack]] within 3 seconds shoots twice, the second shot dealing {{as|{{pp|showtype=true|key=%|50 to 60|1;7;13}} AD {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}}}}, increased to {{as|100% AD}} against minions.

The second shot applies [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} for {{as|75% {{critical damage|75}} '''bonus''' physical damage}}, increased to {{as|100% {{critical damage|100}}|physical damage}} against minions.
If '''Lucian's''' primary target is killed before the second shot can go off, he automatically shoots another enemy.
i1.name: Lightslinger
notes: * ''Lightslinger'' is triggered and consumed by the first attack.
* The second attack will prioritize enemy champions (even if hidden in fog of war or in brush) and enemy minions with low health.
** ''Lightslinger'' will still be consumed if no second target is found when ''Lucian'' fires.

* ''Lucian'' can move freely while firing ''Lightslinger'' since the second attack is integrated into the first one (like {{ai|Double Strike|Master Yi}}) and has special movement animations depending on the direction he is moving while firing.
* The second shot will not proc [[on-hit effect|on-attack effects]]  like {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}} or {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}}.

q1.blurb: Lucian shoots a bolt of piercing light through a target.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a {{pp|0.4 to 0.25}}-second delay, '''Lucian''' fires a laser in the direction of the target enemy, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies in a line.
q1.name: Piercing Light
notes: * ''Piercing Light'' will attempt to lead the target if it is moving but does not adjust further during cast time (enemies can dodge the laser if they change their velocity by a sufficient amount during the delay).

w1.blurb: Lucian shoots a missile that explodes in a star shape, marking enemies. Lucian gains Movement Speed for attacking marked enemies.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a {{fd|0.25}}-second delay, '''Lucian''' fires a shot that explodes in a cross pattern upon hitting an enemy or reaching the end of its path, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}}.
Enemies hit are {{as|marked|buzzword}} for 6 seconds, granting {{tip|sight}} of them for the same duration.
'''Lucian''' gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 1 second if he or allied champions damage a {{as|marked|Buzzword}} target.
w1.name: Ardent Blaze
notes: * ''Lucian'' will not gain ''Ardent Blaze's'' bonus movement speed if attacks on {{as|marked|buzzword}} targets are {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}}, {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}}, {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}}, or if he is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.
* ''Ardent Blaze's'' cross pattern will grant {{tip|sight}} of any {{ii|Control Ward}} hidden inside brushes.
* [[Damage over time|DoT]] will proc ''Ardent Blaze'' only once.

e1.blurb: Lucian quickly dashes a short distance. Lightslinger attacks reduce Relentless Pursuit's cooldown.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} ''Relentless Pursuit's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced by 1 second for each {{ai|Lightslinger|Lucian}} shot landed, doubled to 2 seconds against enemy champions.
e1.name: Relentless Pursuit
notes: * {{ai|Lightslinger|Lucian}} does not interact with {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}} when reducing ''Relentless Pursuit's'' cooldown.

r1.blurb: Lucian unleashes a torrent of shots from his weapons.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lucian''' fires shots in the target direction for 3 seconds, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to the first enemy they collide with. The damage is doubled against enemy minions.

While using ''The Culling'', '''Lucian''' cannot use [[basic attack]]s, {{ai|Piercing Light|Lucian}} or {{ai|Ardent Blaze|Lucian}}, but is {{tip|ghosted}}, can move freely, and can activate {{ai|Relentless Pursuit|Lucian}}. ''The Culling'' can only be interrupted by [[crowd control]] that prevents the ability to use basic attacks.
''The Culling'' can be reactivated to end its effects prematurely.
leveling:
{{st|Physical Damage Per Shot|{{ap|20 to 50}} {{as|(+ 25% AD)}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}}|Total non-minion damage|{{ap|20*20|35*25|50*30}} {{as|(+ {{ap|25*20 to 25*30}}% AD)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|10*20 to 10*30}}% AP)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Shots Fired|{{ap|20 to 30}}}}
r1.name: The Culling
notes: * ''Lucian'' '''does not''' [[channel]] during ''The Culling'' (he will keep firing while {{tip|silence|silenced}} and/or {{tip|blind|blinded}}).

* ''Lucian'' must be {{tip|airborne|displaced}}, {{tip|charm|charmed}}, {{tip|fear|feared}}, {{tip|taunt|taunted}}, {{tip|entangle|entangled}}, {{tip|stun|stunned}}, {{tip|suppression|suppressed}}, {{tip|disarm|disarmed}} and/or {{tip|polymorph|polymorphed}} in order to interrupt ''The Culling''.

* ''Lucian'' can activate {{si|Ghost}}, {{si|Flash}}, {{si|Barrier}}, {{si|Heal}} and {{ai|Relentless Pursuit|Lucian}} (as well as interact with {{ai|Dark Passage|Thresh}} or {{ai|Devour|Tahm Kench}}) without interrupting ''The Culling''.

* For the purposes of direction-based abilities ({{ai|Backstab|Shaco}}, {{ai|Mocking Shout|Tryndamere}}, {{ai|Petrifying Gaze|Cassiopeia}}) ''Lucian'' is facing in the direction he is moving and not the one his model is facing.

* Since ''The Culling'' is made up of two parallel [[skillshot]]s it is possible for enemies to take only half the damage (half of ''Lucian's'' shots) if they stand on the edge of ''The Culling's'' fire line.
* Even though each bullet can only hit one target, it will not proc {{ii|Muramana}} since ''The Culling'' applies spell effects as an {{tip|area of effect}}.
